Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 95th/Woodlawn

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line and Purple Line Express Service Delayed near Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line and Purple Line Express trains are still standing near Sedgwick due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line and Purple Line Express trains are still standing near Sedgwick due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #37 Sedgwick

Also, as a result of the delayed train shuttle buses are requested from Belmont to Clark/lake to provide connecting service in both directions.

Purple Line Express trains will operate only between Linden and Belmont.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
